p: All the 109 patients diagnosed with influenza A(H1N1)pdm09 infection received oseltamivir (Tamiflu) treatment. Four patients died due to INF A/H1N1 (2012-2, 2015-2) as a result of acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) even after the initiation of oseltamivir (Tamiflu) treatment, giving a case fatality rate of 3.7%. All the four patients were from Puducherry; above 30 years; 2 were male, 2 female. No deaths were reported due to non-influenza viral ARI.
